column2: This spreadsheet consolidates the proposals that advanced through the evaluation process. The second tab, “Pre-Screening Stage”, shows all proposals that initially passed thematic screening for Distributed Decision Making (DDM). The final tab, “Distributed Decision Making – Final Evaluation”, contains the consolidated and endorsed list of proposals, after applying all additional filters (moderation exclusions, score thresholds, and qualitative review on team, budget, and KPIs).
